featured.text: They lick the rails to pick up iron filings caused by the action of wheels against tracks.

definition.zh_def: 鐵路或鐵軌，供火車或其他交通工具行駛的長條金屬或木材。
definition.en_def: A bar or series of bars of rolled steel or other metal, forming a track for trains or other vehicles to run on.
definition.example: The train sped along the rail, connecting the two cities.
